@Module.Name: Plan
@Module.Description: This module is a plan module, planning the next action based on the selected components, whether click or edit

candidate1.reason: The user may want to perform a search or type a web address, so clicking on the search box component would be the appropriate action.

candidate2.reason: The user may want to perform a voice search, so clicking on the voice search button component would be the appropriate action.

candidate3.reason: The user may want to access the browser menu, so clicking on the browser menu button component would be the appropriate action.

candidate4.reason: The user may want to go forward to a previous page, so clicking on the go forward button component would be the appropriate action.

candidate5.reason: The user may want to go back to a previous page, so clicking on the go back button component would be the appropriate action.

@Module.Name: Evaluate

@Module.Name: Decide
